verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: hand] - [V: held] [ARG1: apple pies] when i was in high school my best friend mother baked mini apple pies every year i was thrilled when she shared the recipe with me — it made me feel like i was finally an adult —katie ferrier houston texas apple
